languages.text: "Я — чистый. Мои мать и отец возводят родословную к тем, кто получил дар генетического совершенства от самого Предка. Будь между мной и ими пара поколений, я был бы более схож обликом с Предком, чем с тобой, но... У каждого свое служение. Я выгляжу почти как ложноверец..." {n}Энрих приподнимает сварочные очки со лба, обнажая зачатки фиолетового гребня.{/n} "...а значит, мне было суждено стать шпионом среди вас".

"I am pure. My mother and father both trace their lineage back to the ones who received the gift of genetic perfection from the Sire himself. Had there been a few more generations between us, I would have resembled the Sire more closely, but... each of us has their own calling. I look almost like a false believer..." {n}Einrich lifts the welding goggles from his forehead, exposing the rudiments of a purple crest.{/n} "...which means that I was destined to be a spy among you."
languages.original_text: "Я — чистый. Мои мать и отец возводят родословную к тем, кто получил дар генетического совершенства от самого Предка. Будь между мной и ими пара поколений, я был бы более схож обликом с Предком, чем с тобой, но... У каждого свое служение. Я выгляжу почти как ложноверец..." {n}Энрих приподнимает сварочные очки со лба, обнажая зачатки фиолетового гребня.{/n} "...а значит, мне было суждено стать шпионом среди вас".

traits.locale_text: "I am pure. My mother and father both trace their lineage back to the ones who received the gift of genetic perfection from the Ancestor himself. If there were a couple more generations between us, I would be more similar in appearance to the Ancestor, but... Each has their own calling. I look almost like a false believer..." {n}Einrich lifts the welding goggles from his forehead, exposing the rudiments of a purple crest.{/n} "...which means I was destined to be a spy among you."
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

I look almost like a false believer..." {n}Einrich lifts the welding goggles from his forehead, exposing the rudiments of a purple crest.{/n} "...which means that I was destined to be a spy among you."

languages.text: «Soy puro. Mi padre y mi madre pueden trazar su linaje a los que recibieron el don de la perfección genética del mismo Progenitor. Si hubieran pasado algunas generaciones más entre nosotros, me parecería más al Progenitor, pero... cada uno tiene su cometido. Yo casi parezco un falso creyente...». {n}Einrich se levanta las gafas de soldar de la frente, mostrando los principios de una cresta morada.{/n} «...y por eso estaba destinado a ser un espía entre vosotros».
languages.original_text: "I am pure. My mother and father both trace their lineage back to the ones who received the gift of genetic perfection from the Sire himself. Had there been a few more generations between us, I would have resembled the Sire more closely, but... each of us has their own calling. I look almost like a false believer..." {n}Einrich lifts the welding goggles from his forehead, exposing the rudiments of a purple crest.{/n} "...which means that I was destined to be a spy among you."

traits.locale_text: «Soy puro. Mis padres pueden trazar su linaje a los que recibieron el don de la perfección genética del mismo Abuelo. Si hubieran pasado algunas generaciones más entre nosotros, me parecería más al Abuelo, pero... cada uno tiene su cometido. Yo casi parezco un falso creyente...». {n}Einrich se levanta las gafas de soldar de la frente, mostrando los principios de una cresta morada.{/n} «...y por eso estaba destinado a ser un espía entre vosotros».
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: 「私は純血です。母も父も、サイアーから完全たる遺伝子を授かった者の血筋を引いています。もう少し世代が離れていたら、私はもっとサイアーに似ていたかもしれませんが…各々、自分の務めがある。私は偽りの信者に似ていた…」{n}アインリッヒは溶接ゴーグルを額から外し、紫色の紋章を見せた。{/n}「…つまり、私はあなた方の間でスパイになる運命だったということです」
languages.original_text: "I am pure. My mother and father both trace their lineage back to the ones who received the gift of genetic perfection from the Sire himself. Had there been a few more generations between us, I would have resembled the Sire more closely, but... each of us has their own calling. I look almost like a false believer..." {n}Einrich lifts the welding goggles from his forehead, exposing the rudiments of a purple crest.{/n} "...which means that I was destined to be a spy among you."

traits.locale_text: 「私は純血です。両親はともに、グランドファーザーから完全たる遺伝子を授かった者の血筋を引いています。もう少し世代が離れていたら、私はもっとグランドファーザーに似ていたかもしれませんが…各々、自分の務めがある。私は偽りの信者に似ていた…」{n}アインリッヒは溶接ゴーグルを額から外し、紫色の紋章を見せた。{/n}「…つまり、私はあなた方の間でスパイになる運命だったということです」
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: “我是纯血的后代，我父母的血统可以追溯到从族长那里得到完美基因的那一代人。如果能再过几代人的话，我的外表可能会与族长更为接近。不过……我们每个人都有各自的使命，而我的外表与虚假的信徒没有任何区别……”{n}艾因里奇摘下了额头上的焊接护目镜，露出了紫色虫冠的雏形。{/n}“……也就是说，我的使命就是潜伏在你们之中。”
languages.original_text: "I am pure. My mother and father both trace their lineage back to the ones who received the gift of genetic perfection from the Sire himself. Had there been a few more generations between us, I would have resembled the Sire more closely, but... each of us has their own calling. I look almost like a false believer..." {n}Einrich lifts the welding goggles from his forehead, exposing the rudiments of a purple crest.{/n} "...which means that I was destined to be a spy among you."

traits.locale_text: “我是纯血的后代，我父母的血统都可以追溯到从祖父那里得到完美基因的那一代人。如果能再过几代，我可能看起来会更像我的祖父。不过……我们每个人都有各自的使命，而我的外表与虚假的信徒没有任何区别……”{n}艾因里奇摘下了额头上的焊接护目镜，露出了紫色虫冠的雏形。{/n}“……也就是说，我的使命就是潜入你们之中。”
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: "Ich bin rein. Meine Eltern können ihre Linie bis zu jenen zurückverfolgen, die vom Schöpfer selbst das Geschenk der genetischen Perfektion erhalten haben. Wären noch einige Generationen mehr zwischen uns gelegen, hätte ich dem Schöpfer ähnlicher gesehen, doch ... jeder von uns hat seine eigene Berufung. Ich sehe fast aus wie ein falscher Gläubiger"{n}, Einrich nimmt sich die Schutzbrille von der Stirn und gibt den Blick auf die Rudimente eines violetten Kamms frei,{/n} "war also dazu bestimmt, unter Euresgleichen zu spionieren."
languages.original_text: "I am pure. My mother and father both trace their lineage back to the ones who received the gift of genetic perfection from the Sire himself. Had there been a few more generations between us, I would have resembled the Sire more closely, but... each of us has their own calling. I look almost like a false believer..." {n}Einrich lifts the welding goggles from his forehead, exposing the rudiments of a purple crest.{/n} "...which means that I was destined to be a spy among you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin rein. Beide meine Eltern können ihre Linie bis zu jenen zurückverfolgen, die von Großvater selbst das Geschenk der genetischen Perfektion erhalten haben. Wären noch einige Generationen mehr zwischen uns gelegen, hätte ich Großvater ähnlicher gesehen, doch ... jeder von uns hat seine eigene Berufung. Ich sehe fast aus wie ein falscher Gläubiger"{n}, Einrich nimmt sich die Schutzbrille von der Stirn und gibt den Blick auf die Rudimente eines violetten Kamms frei,{/n} "war also dazu bestimmt, unter Euresgleichen zu spionieren."
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: « Je suis pur. Ma lignée remonte à ceux qui ont reçu le don de perfection génétique de la part du Sire lui-même, et ce, aussi bien du côté de mon père que de ma mère. Si j'étais né quelques générations plus tard, je ressemblerais plus au Sire, mais... à chacun sa vocation. Je peux passer pour un faux croyant... » {n}Einrich retire les lunettes de soudure de son front, dévoilant la naissance d'une crête pourpre.{/n} « ... ce qui signifie que j'étais destiné à devenir un espion. »
languages.original_text: "I am pure. My mother and father both trace their lineage back to the ones who received the gift of genetic perfection from the Sire himself. Had there been a few more generations between us, I would have resembled the Sire more closely, but... each of us has their own calling. I look almost like a false believer..." {n}Einrich lifts the welding goggles from his forehead, exposing the rudiments of a purple crest.{/n} "...which means that I was destined to be a spy among you."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis pur. Ma lignée remonte à ceux qui ont reçu le don de perfection génétique de la part du Père lui-même, et ce, aussi bien du côté de mon père que de ma mère. Si j'étais né quelques générations plus tard, je ressemblerais plus au Père, mais... à chacun sa vocation. Je peux passer pour un faux croyant... » {n}Einrich retire les lunettes de soudure de son front, dévoilant la naissance d'une crête pourpre.{/n} « ... ce qui signifie que j'étais destiné à devenir un espion. »
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: "Ben safım. Anne ve babam, genetik kusursuzluk armağanını bizzat Efendi'nin kendisinden alan bir soydan geliyor. Aramızda birkaç nesil daha olsaydı Efendi'ye daha fazla benzerdim ama... Her birimizin kendine ait bir amacı var. Ben neredeyse bir sahte inanana benziyorum." {n}Einrich, alnındaki kaynak gözlüklerini kaldırıp tam oluşmamış mor ibiğini gösteriyor.{/n} "Yani benim kaderimde sizin aranıza sızan bir casus olmak vardı."
languages.original_text: "I am pure. My mother and father both trace their lineage back to the ones who received the gift of genetic perfection from the Sire himself. Had there been a few more generations between us, I would have resembled the Sire more closely, but... each of us has their own calling. I look almost like a false believer..." {n}Einrich lifts the welding goggles from his forehead, exposing the rudiments of a purple crest.{/n} "...which means that I was destined to be a spy among you."
